text: Izumi Shikibu (b. 976?) was a mid-Heian period Japanese poet. She is a member of the Thirty-six Medieval Poetry Immortals. She lived in the same time period of Murasaki Shikibu and Akazome Emon at the court of empress Joto Mon'in. Category:970s births Category:11th-century deaths Category:Japanese poets
title: Izumi Shikibu
